remarks: Closure law for the vector subtraction operation of a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvmf.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvmf.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvmcl $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) e. X ) $.
